name: Ch15ABaseConvo1
_source: speak;Gerik;There you are.|You shouldn't be wandering off alone right now.
speak;Joshua;I can still see the smoke.|Even from this far out in the desert...|Jehanna Hall is still burning.
speak;Gerik;I know.|I'm sorry about your mother, Joshua.|Queen Ismaire was a fine ruler.
speak;Joshua;And I wasn't there for her.|Not when it mattered.
speak;Gerik;Don't do that to yourself.|You couldn't have known what Grado was planning.
speak;Joshua;I abandoned my duties for years, Gerik.|Played at being a sellsword while she carried the burden alone.
speak;Joshua;And now...|My home is ash. My mother is gone.|And Caellach...
speak;Joshua;We were mercenaries together, once.|Worked for the same company before he joined Grado.|Never thought he'd go this far.
speak;Gerik;The Tiger Eye...|I know of him too.
speak;Gerik;Our paths crossed years back.|He was leading a band of mercenaries that competed with my company for jobs.|Things got... ugly.
speak;Gerik;He ambushed some of my men while I was away.|Three good fighters died that night.|One was just a kid, barely seventeen.
speak;Joshua;I... didn't know.|That sounds like him, though.|Always looking for the advantage, no matter the cost.
speak;Joshua;He's coming back, you know.|To finish us up in this trap.
speak;Gerik;Then we'll be waiting for him.
speak;Gerik;Listen, Joshua...|I know what it's like to lose people.|To want revenge.
speak;Gerik;Just remember—vengeance can consume you if you let it.|You're more than just your mother's son now.|You're Jehanna's king.
speak;Joshua;A king with no castle and no crown.|Some monarch I've turned out to be.
speak;Gerik;Castles can be rebuilt.|A true king is measured by his resolve, not his palace.
speak;Joshua;My resolve is clear.|Caellach will answer for what he's done.|To my mother. To Jehanna. To your men.
speak;Gerik;Then we're in agreement.|The Desert Tiger fights along Jehanna's crown prince.
speak;Joshua;Heh...|I suppose that's us.|When the time comes, I want to face him myself. You understand?
speak;Gerik;I understand the feeling.|But don't be a fool about it.|Pride gets men killed.
speak;Joshua;It's not pride.|It's duty.|A son's duty to his mother...|A king's duty to his kingdom.
speak;Gerik;Then I'll make sure you get your chance.|And I'll have your back when you do.
speak;Joshua;Let's rejoin the others.|We have a war to win before I can settle that score.
speak;Gerik;When you face him...|Make it count.|For all of us.
speak;Joshua;I will.|That's a promise even I won't gamble on.
